Thank you for taking the time to report a bug in **InsightLog-AI-Assisted-Journal-Capture-Browser-Extension**! Your detailed report helps us improve the quality and stability of the extension.

Before submitting, please ensure you have:
- Checked the [existing issues](https://github.com/chirag127/InsightLog-AI-Assisted-Journal-Capture-Browser-Extension/issues) to see if this bug has already been reported.
- Reviewed the [documentation/README](https://github.com/chirag127/InsightLog-AI-Assisted-Journal-Capture-Browser-Extension#readme) for any relevant information.
